name: CARPET
description: A carpet is a textile floor covering that adds warmth, comfort, and style to a space.

name: CURTAINS
description: Curtains are fabric panels hung over windows to provide privacy, control light, and enhance the decor of a room.

name: WALL ART
description: Wall art encompasses a wide range of decorative pieces designed to enhance and personalize interior spaces.

name: CUSHION
description: A cushion is a soft, padded accessory designed to provide comfort and support, often used on chairs, sofas, or beds.

name: PLANT POTS
description: Classic, porous clay that allows for good air circulation and moisture control. They often have a warm, earthy color.

name: RUGS
description: Large enough to define spaces within a room, these rugs can anchor furniture arrangements and add warmth.
